overview: This documentary takes us back to the events surrounding 1958 when the University Organic Law was passed. We hear the testimony of three university teachers who took part in the debates and the student activism at that time: the experiences of people who were young “back then”, the cultural context of the period and the connection between the students and the worker's movement.

production_companies.name: Instituto de Cinematografía de la Universidad de la República del Uruguay (ICUR)

title: The Us of Back Then
